name: Soul Guide
description:
Soul Guide 

Ben Shukrallah

You must guide souls out of the underworld into different portals that move throughout the level.

You can see the souls in the underworld beneath you.

Demons will try to kill you. When you kill them they will spawn in the underworld and attack the souls you are guiding.

Souls follow you from below as you move through the level. Guide them to the portals to score points.

If you die, you lose a life. That life will spawn as a green soul in the underworld. 

If you guide the green soul to the portal, you will get that life back. 

Souls that are killed are lost forever.

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD / MOUSE

WSAD - Move

Right Click - Shoot

Space - Jump

CONTROLLER

Joysticks - Move

A - Jump

Right Trigger - Shoot
